title: 10 Minute Guided Meditation for Positivity, Gratitude & Joy ✨ Raise Your Vibration
description:
🌤 Download the audio for this guided meditation → https://lavendaire.com/joy-meditation

Enjoy this 10 minute meditation for positivity, gratitude & joy to help raise your vibration. This is a great meditation for beginners and all levels. Use this as a daily morning meditation, or an evening meditation to cleanse your energy before sleep.

channelDescription:
Hi, I'm Aileen! Lavendaire is a channel about personal growth & lifestyle design, where I share knowledge and inspiration on creating your dream life. ✨

Here you'll find content on: self development, intentional living, self love, habits, healing, mindset, guided meditations, positive affirmations, & more.

Lavendaire is for the dreamers who believe. For those who are smart, curious, and conscious, with an open mind, a love for learning, and a deep desire to live a brilliant and vibrant life.

In short, Lavendaire is for the artist of life.

//  Life is an art. Make it your masterpiece.  //

comments: ✨ Ready to transform your life in 2025? ✨ The Artist of Life Workbook is your personal guide to setting goals, finding clarity, and creating the life you want. Start your journey here: https://lavendaire.com/workbook 🌟

Yes you, whose reading this comment right now,I want you to know that all the things you wished for will come true, even if it doesn't seems like it is not coming,it will come into reality one day. Maybe it won't go in your way but still it will come and you will realise how powerful you are. Sending lots of positivity in your way!!!♡Have a lovely journey.

Just when I needed this🥺🥺 I've been feeling quite stuck in life over the past few months but starting this month, I made up my mind to do the best I can, show up and take the goodness in life. Would include this every morning now❤ I've been in love with your videos since the Covid days and you really helped me. Sending lots of love and power to you🌸🌸 Just wanted to write it all out🥰

This is one of the channels that gave me the courage to start my YouTube channel 8 months ago about self development. Now I have 835 subs and > 400 hours of watch time. I know it’s not comparable with others but I’m still proud I started because I’ve been learning so many lessons that I could haven’t learned without getting started in the 1st place.
